com.sillysoft.vox.agent
Class VoxAgentBase

java.lang.Object
  com.sillysoft.vox.agent.VoxAgentBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
VoxAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AI1, AI2, AI3, Angry, Bubbles, Earl, Grabby, Holdem, Kodos, Quirky, wandering
public abstract class VoxAgentBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements VoxAgent

VoxAgentBase is an abstract agent class containing utility methods. Sub-class it to gain easy access to them.

declareMoves

public void declareMoves(Country[] countries)
Description copied from interface: VoxAgent
Each turn this method is called for the agent to send his moves to the VoxWorld. This is the method where most of your bot smarts will go. Look inside Grabby or another example bot to see how to interact with the game.

Specified by:
declareMoves in interface VoxAgent

message

public java.lang.String message(java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.Object data)
We get notified through this methos when certain things happen. We parse out all the different messages and do nothing with them. Not sure if this works yet ???

Specified by:
message in interface VoxAgent

moveTowardsEnemySplittingUp

public void moveTowardsEnemySplittingUp(UnitStack units,
                                        Country from)
Will move all units towards enemies. If there are multiple equi-distant paths, it will split up the stack into multiple groups, each going along one of those paths.

name

public java.lang.String name()
Description copied from interface: VoxAgent
This is the name of your agent. It will identify you in the info window and record books.

Specified by:
name in interface VoxAgent

setPrefs

public void setPrefs(int newID,
                     VoxWorld theworld)
Description copied from interface: VoxAgent
At the start of the game your agent will be constructed and then the setPrefs() method will be called. It will tell you your ownerCode as well as give you a reference to the VoxWorld object for this game. You should store this information, as you will need it later.

Specified by:
setPrefs in interface VoxAgent

version

public float version()
Description copied from interface: VoxAgent
The version of your agent. It is used by the plugin manager to notify the user when new versions are made available.

Specified by:
version in interface VoxAgent

youWon

public java.lang.String youWon()
Description copied from interface: VoxAgent
If your agent wins the game then this method will be called.
Whatever you return will be displayed in big letters across the screen.

If you think that you will win a lot please provide many different answers for variety.

Specified by:
youWon in interface VoxAgent
